title: Tourism - City of Martin
text: Make ItMartinSHOP, DINE, & Experience The City of Martin is home to the University of Tennessee at Martin and a variety of delicious eateries and local boutiques, there is something for the whole family to enjoy. Plan a weekend adventure and visit the many events, shops, restaurants, and other activities that Martin, TN has to offer! From restaurants to retail stores, the breathtaking scenic beauty of Martin, Tennessee is surely something to see. Shop Dine Experience Upcoming Events There are no upcoming events at this time.
